CustomField.formula: AND( Effective_Date__c <= TODAY(), Renewal_Date__c > TODAY(), OR( ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "New Business" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "New Business - BOR" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Renewal" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Remarketed at Renewal" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Cancel/Rewrite" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Tail/Run Off" ), ISPICKVAL( Policy_Type_Status__c, "Rewrite" ) ), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "On Hold") ) ) )
CustomField.label: In-Force
